name: Up For It
description:
Up For It is a local co-op puzzle & platform game for 2 players where the goal is to get to the top by stacking blocks of various shapes. 

There is a catch however! Players can only jump up and stand on blocks of their own colour, but can only pick up the blocks of the other players' colour.  For example: The Blue player can only pick up Pink blocks, but only jump and stand on Blue blocks. 

Blocks are stackable and players must build a working path which both players can climb to reach the goal with the flag on top. When both players reach the platform with the flag, you win the game!

Features:

  • 2 Levels: Level 1(Easy) & Level 2(HARD)
  • Challenging gameplay that builds trust and communication!
  • This game is *hard*... don't beat yourselves up too much ^^'
  • Local highscore board

Controls:

Player 1:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Pick Up - F
  • Delete picked up block - X

Player 2:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Pick Up - Shift
  • Delete picked up block - Right Ctrl Key
